context:
The following methods of payment are accepted at George Brown College:
1. Pay online using a credit card through STU-VIEW or financial services portal.
2. Pay through online/telephone banking or in person at your bank, selecting "GEORGE BROWN COL.-CUR.YR.-TUITION" as the payee and using your student ID as the account number.
3. Pay with Aeroplan® Miles through the HigherEdPoints.com program. For every 35,000 Aeroplan® Miles, $250 can be offset against college costs. The transfer will appear on your student account within 2-3 business days as a non-refundable cash deposit.

Contact details:
- Phone: 416-415-2000 or toll-free in Canada and USA: 1-800-265-2002
- Email: ask.george@georgebrown.ca
- TTY: 1-877-515-5559

Winter 2024 program delivery information is available on the website.

For further details on payment methods, please visit the HigherEdPoints website.

Note: Information contained in this website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
